detail_desc: Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with a tab and button and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of trousers in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric. Top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and dropped shoulders with a press-stud at one side. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif at the top and a jersey-lined hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Reversible triangle bikini top with a pattern on one side and solid colour on the other. Lined triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, narrow shoulder straps and ties at the back.

Top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front, (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs, slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft scuba aqua shoes with elastication at the top and a loop at the back. Scuba linings and insoles and textured rubber soles.
Top in satin with lace details, narrow shoulder straps and a deep V-neck front and back.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered appliqué on the front and a concealed press-stud at the back. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Oversized sports hoodie in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Wide jacket in a woven cotton blend with a stand-up, drawstring collar and press-studs down the front. Long, wide raglan sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and patch front pockets with a flap. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Court shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and covered block heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Gently flared dress in glittery tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and short, butterfly sleeves. Satin lining.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with jetted front pockets with decorative studs and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Single-breasted jacket in an Oxford cotton weave with a decorative chest pocket, fake flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Knitted jacket with a soft, thermal fleece inside. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and front pockets. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a print motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, a zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Cold shoulder dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Patterned nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 6 cm.
Short, A-line dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Shorts in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 10-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details and sequins. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, tie belt and zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets with a decorative flap and button, and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Vest top in slub cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and raw edges.
Long-sleeved tunic in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, button placket and a yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back. Seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, organic cotton knit. Jumper with buttons down one side and long raglan sleeves. Trousers with covered elastication at the waist.
Fully-fashioned fabric trainers with an imitation leather heel cap, lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, covered elastication at the waist, short legs and a lined front.

Padded parka in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Fleece-lined hood with a concealed elastic drawstring and a two-way zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets with a zip, fleece-lined front pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Fleece lining. The parka has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short-sleeved, V-neck jumpsuit in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck and a narrow, elasticated seam and detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Side pockets, pleats at the waist and wide, ankle-length legs.
Short 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Soft cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastening at the back.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Imitation suede jacket with a lined hood, draped lapels and diagonal zip at the front. Side pockets and one zipped sleeve pocket. Pile lining.
Push-up lace bralette with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening.
Dressing gown in a patterned, softly draping weave with trims. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves, and concealed ties and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of dungarees in soft cotton. Top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder. Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with adjustable straps that fasten at the front, elastication at the back of the waist, a printed kangaroo pocket with appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Santa hat with reversible sequins, and a faux fur pompom and trim.
Glittery handbag with a print motif and appliqués on the front, two handles at the top and a zip with a faux fur heart. Lined. Size 8x14x20 cm.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Fake diagonal front pockets with decorative buttons, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.

Cotton poplin shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a high cut at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.

Sleeveless maxi dress in a viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an open section with lacing at the back. Concealed zip in one side and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Chinos in light twill made from cotton and some linen. Relaxed fit with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and slightly shorter, tapered legs. Side pockets and one flap back pocket with a button.
Shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky polyurethane soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with concealed press-studs and ties at one side, a wrapover front and asymmetric hem. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Wide blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a small, frilled collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a double frill front and back. Long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs with a frill trim.
Long T-shirt in hole-patterned cotton jersey with a print motif, sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and raw, roll edges around the neckline and hem.

Long dress in a patterned viscose weave with elastication and a double flounce at the top and narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. Narrow, twisted tie belt with tassels at the waist and gathered tiers on the skirt to create movement. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy weave with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Pleats at the front and a box pleat at the back. Lined.

Short parka in a nylon and cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Sandals with narrow straps. Adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a padded collar and a zip with a chin guard and grosgrain zip tab with a text print. Front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Waist bag in soft imitation leather with a large zipped compartment and an inner zipped compartment. Detachable metal chain at the front with carabiner hooks. Adjustable waist strap with a metal buckle. Lined. Depth 5 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 27 cm.
Pineapple-shaped metal earrings with faceted sparkly stones at the top. Length 5.5 cm.
Pyjamas in jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems. Soft jersey lining for extra warmth.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, chunky knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a unique nursing feature and lace-trimmed V-neck. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
